title: PGIMER Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Research Associate Post
description: Post Graduate Institute of Medical Education and Research, Chandigarh (PGIMER Chandigarh) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Research Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Pharm, MVSc, M.E/ M.Tech can grab this chance and apply for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible cand...
